parameters.name: SecurityToken
parameters.description: The security token included in the WebSocket request header. The system uses this token to authenticate the request.

parameters.name: SignatureId
parameters.description: The ID of the signature key that you want to manage.

parameters.name: SignatureKey
parameters.description: The new Key value of the key. The value must be 6 to 20 characters in length and can contain letters, digits, and underscores (\_). It must start with a letter.

parameters.name: SignatureName
parameters.description: The new name of the key. The name must be 4 to 50 characters in length and can contain letters, digits, and underscores (\_). It must start with a letter.

parameters.name: SignatureSecret
parameters.description: The new Secret value of the key. The value must be 6 to 30 characters in length and can contain letters, digits, and special characters. Special characters include underscores (\_), at signs (@), number signs (#), exclamation points (!), and asterisks (\*). The value must start with a letter.
